public class DeletePatternAction
extends DeleteModelElementAction

Implements an action to delete a pattern.

closeEditor

protected boolean closeEditor(NamedModelElementWithId modelElement_p)
Description copied from class: DeleteModelElementAction
Close the editor related to given model element if any.
Default implementation does nothing.

Overrides:
closeEditor in class DeleteModelElementAction
Returns:
true means the editor is correctly closed and given model element can be safely deleted.
Default implementation returns true.
